title: Text Page, ca. 1980
markings: Watermark across upper and lower edges of sheet:  Ingres-Fabriano
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, lower right corner:  Luce Balla/Elica Balla
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: 45 [over]150
description: Title page for seventh plate.  Text in vertical block, flush right, with title of plate 7 at upper right corner;  authorization of reproductive prints with complete list of prints below.  [See 1999-6-5-5.]

tombstone.epitaph:
Text Page, ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Letterpress on cream laid paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-17.
